meanings.definition: Crack or split in the surface of something
meanings.sent1: The hiker noticed a deep fissured in the rock.
meanings.sent2: The fissured in the sidewalk needed repair to prevent accidents.
meanings.sent3: The fissured in the ice cream cone caused a delicious mess.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a fissured, broken mirror reflecting pain.
meanings.sent5: The fissured in the tree bark looked like a lightning bolt.

meanings.definition: Divided or split into many parts or branches
meanings.sent1: The fissured road led to different neighborhoods.
meanings.sent2: The fissured puzzle was challenging to put together.
meanings.sent3: The fissured cake had layers of delicious frosting in between.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt like a fissured map, with thoughts going in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The fissured tree had branches reaching out in every direction.
